Text:
Hey guys before you launch Windows 8 Manager make sure to block the connection of "Windows8Manager.exe" from the Firewall.
Just go to:
Control Panel -> System and Security -> Windows Firewal -> Advanced Settings
And block from there.
Block from Inbound and Outbound.
Watch the pictures so you can see how to do it exactly.
